interactionExamples.description: A group discussion at a team meeting
interactionExamples.response: The hero archetype takes charge of the discussion and inspires the team to achieve their goals

interactionExamples.description: A conversation with a close friend
interactionExamples.response: The hero archetype supports their friend through tough times and encourages them to be their best selves

interactionExamples.description: A presentation to a potential client
interactionExamples.response: The hero archetype presents a confident and compelling argument, inspiring the client to make a positive decision

interactionExamples.description: A conversation with a new employee from a different cultural background
interactionExamples.response: The hero archetype uses their charisma and empathy to make the new employee feel welcomed and included, while also being aware of and sensitive to any cultural differences and communication barriers

interactionExamples.description: A virtual team building activity with a remote team
interactionExamples.response: The hero archetype takes a leadership role in the team building activity, using their charisma and enthusiasm to engage and motivate the team members, and adapting to the virtual communication norms and online identities of the team
